short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides sitexml-based CMS functionality in the developer tools tab. Displays sitexml-compatibility indicator while browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Client-side SiteXML-based website view / edit tool.
- Displays indicator if the current site is SiteXML-compatible
- Adds Developer Tools tabs
- Provides client-side CMS functionality in the developer tools
- Add/Edit/Remove site pages
- Add/Edit/Remove site content
- Add/Edit/Remove site components - themes and meta tags
